name: Seven 7? Mysteries
description:
GoddessGwaj has Demanded ALL 7 SEVENs Be Given To HER!

You Are Tin7Men...the Last 7 SEVENS...brought to life by R.A.M.A.Y.A.N.A.

A truly Loving CompAltar...and Asks You to Help Save The SEVEN 7s

Follow the Rings of the Rainbow, as Lovable Tin7Men or in your fancy RingShip.

(If you'd like to chat with others players or the developers in real-time...

...you'll have to play the Demo .  Thanks to Their Temple for hosting!)
